    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AbstractDAO<T>
    Generic Data Access Object using Java Reflection.
    Bill
    Immutable data model representing a bill (invoice) generated for each order.
    Client
    Data model representing a client in the system.
    ClientBLL
    Business logic class managing client-related operations.
    ClientController
    Controller class that manages client-related operations within the application GUI.
    ClientDAO
    DAO for Client entities.
    ClientView
    Swing UI panel for client operations.
    ConnectionFactory
    Utility class for establishing database connections.
    LogDAO
    DAO class for managing the Log table, which stores Bill objects.
    Main
     
    MainController
    Main controller for application views.
    MainView
    Main window for the application using Swing.
    OrderBLL
    Handles order logic, such as placing orders and updating product stock.
    OrderController
    Controller class that handles all logic for creating and managing orders.
    OrderDAO
    DAO for Order entities.
    Orders
    Data model for representing an order.
    OrderView
    UI panel for managing and placing orders.
    PDFGenerator
    Utility class responsible for generating PDF bills using iText.
    Product
    Data model representing a product entity.
    ProductBLL
    Manages business logic related to Product operations.
    ProductController
    Controller class responsible for managing product-related operations in the GUI.
    ProductDAO
    DAO for Product entities.
    ProductView
    UI for adding/editing/viewing products.
    TabelGenerator
    Utility class for generating JTable components dynamically using reflection.
